title: Bix Magic Cube Game World - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Master-Servant Relationship   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong
author: SISIMO
description: The player named Pei Sen of the holographic game Bix Magic Cube traveled to the time before the game opens service. He found that the place he lived in was not a game, but a real world. He had to be a valet to take care of the young master of Golden Rose Manor called Igel. However, after more and more game players was breaking into the game, a lot of strange and interesting things happened and Pei Sen fell in love with Igel gradually...>
